A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not the worst movie and has its moments... but the story just felt it had been reverse-engineered\, the end supposedly justifying the awkward means.\n\nThis isn't a movie I'll be happy to watch multiple times over the years... they wanted the cinematic power of Empire but fell way short.  Great acting\, effects\, and the usual trappings... just a weak overall story and poor pacing.
